TopicTitle: RSS mod and maybe KSP itself ?

Articles.Content:
This could be KSP/Unity itself or the RSS mod.

The key feature is the 200 metre mark, where the target ship warps off... [https://www.dropbox.com/s/ftdefrahekyc992/200m_Error.avi?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ftdefrahekyc992/200m_Error.avi?dl=0)

Maybe KSP/Unity devs, or RSS recognise the 200m number, which might be firing off an event of sorts.

I'll carry on looking into this.. as I cannot get beyond earth until this is resolved..

(ignore the altimeter readings - have height above ground mod installed - this was happening before this mod)

Later
